DOC.detailed_description: Health questionnaires health diary two form patient-reported outcome ( PRO ) commonly use healthcare . Health questionnaire often use intake log , discern record symptom severity problem time presentation . Health diary , contrast , ongoing log allow mindful attention symptom monitor response therapy . Unfortunately , type PRO form often under-utilized uninterpretable collect paper . Within urogynecology , PRO scale Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory ( PFDI ) , Pelvic Floor Impact Questionnaire ( PFIQ ) , Bristol Stool Chart , Bladder Diaries others use ubiquitously . Their impact , however , diminish poor compliance recall bias . The move towards electronic PRO measure would endorse patient ( track interact data ) , physician ( track progress study group outcomes ) regulator ( want ensure accurate reproducible data collection ) . Electronic PRO tool , particularly patient 's device , would allow increased rate reporting mobile availability , time stamp data prevent recall bias reduction data entry mistake cost . Study Procedures After informed consent obtain , demographic data collect . Subjects administer questionnaire either paper web-based smartphone form base random number block scheme . At least two week later prior treatment complete form questionnaire . This occur next office visit complete home . Subjects email and/or call research staff remind complete second set questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Women least 18 year age present pelvic floor dysfunction Unable repeat questionnaire return office 2 week No access computer/web smartphone Pregnancy ( gestational age advance 2 week time interval symptom may change )
